title: About Me
paragraphs: Hello! I'm Dale Vincent, a student developer based in the Philippines. I enjoy creating visually appealing and functional websites. My interest in web development started back in 2022, where I learned the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Fast-forward to today, and Iâ€™ve had the privilege of working with modern frameworks like React to build scalable and maintainable applications. My focus is currently on full-stack development, but I always prioritize the user experience on the front-end.
